Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 5 wickets (with 11 balls remaining)
Bangladesh were 71 for 1 at one stage. Then they lost their captain and could manage only 127.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan cranked up the deja vu in Adelaide on Sunday as they sailed into the T20 World Cup semi-finals. If anyone is still working on time travel, please follow this cricket team. They've made it 1992 again.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This game wouldn't even have played out this way if not for Netherlands shocking South Africa.
Others: The biggest casualty of this unreal series of events were Bangladesh and Shakib Al Hasan. His wicket turned this game, adjudged lbw on field, and upheld on DRS even though he was absolutely certain he'd nicked the ball.
